other_title: La Leggenda della Stella della Senna (Italian)
plot: The story is set in Paris, on the night before the France Revolution. The civilians have been suffering under the tyranical rule of Louis, the sixteenth. In order to release the people from their suffering, Simone, a young girl whose parents were killed by the aristocrats, decides to challenge the corrupted aristocrats. Covering her face with a red mask and leaving a red carnation as a mark of her presence, Simone is La Seine no Hoshi.
opening_theme: "La Seine no Hoshi" (ラ・セーヌの星) by Mitsuko Horie and Columbia Yurikago Kai
"La Seine no Hoshi" (ラ・セーヌの星) by Arlène Tempier and Columbia Yurikago Kai
ending_theme: "Watashi wa Simone" (私はシモーヌ) by Mitsuko Horie and Columbia Yurikago Kai
"Watashi wa Simone" (私はシモーヌ) by Arlène Tempier and Columbia Yurikago Kai
